name: NeuroscienceNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill contains the latest neuroscience, neurology and brain health news from NeuroscienceNews.com.
Skill contains the following news topics:
*Neuroscience
*Neurology
*Psychology
*Health
*Alzheimer's Disease
After enabling this skill, you can say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?", or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear the latest updates from NeuroscienceNews.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
